Frozen.NAME: FROZEN
DESCRIPTIONS: This enemy cannot act this turn.

AttackBackFreeze.NAME: Chilly
DESCRIPTIONS: When you are attacked, #yFreeze the enemy.

FreezeNextTurn.NAME: Freezing
DESCRIPTIONS: This monster will be #yFrozen at the start of next turn.

FrozenDiscardP.NAME: Chilly Redirection
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards will be sent to the draw pile instead of the discard pile.

ColdEchoFormP.NAME: Frozen Domain
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards that target #yCold enemies will be free and be played #b

PutBackCards.NAME: Icicle Fall
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card this turn, put a random card in your hand to the bottom of your draw pile.

UpgradeShiveringCardsP.NAME: Studious Efforts
DESCRIPTIONS: cards drawn this turn outside the start of the turn.

DealDamageOnDraw.NAME: Kiss of Death
DESCRIPTIONS: When you draw a card deal #b
